name: Don't leave me alone
description:
The last chance of an old man to stay together with his family. Action game with 4 bosses and 2 endings. 

Controls:
W A S D  to move and mouse right to shoot

BUG: If the player makes crazy moves, click outside the window and click inside again. I'm looking for a solution, it seems like something from WebGL. Also, you can dowload the Windows version without this bug. 

Jam: 
https://itch.io/jam/abandoned-game-jam-with-foxes
